properties.value: The games room in a player-owned house is a place to play games and have fun. This room can be created at 30 Construction, costing 25,000. Players who win at one of these games may obtain a prize key, which can be used to receive a reward from the prize chest.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Games room
For a list of all items and upgrades within the Construction skill, see Construction/Level up table.
For the minigame where players can meet up to play various board games, see Burthorpe Games Room.
Games room
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
Icon
Construction level30
Cost25,000
Door layout
Games room

The games room in a player-owned house is a place to play games and have fun. This room can be created at 30 Construction, costing 25,000. Players who win at one of these games may obtain a prize key, which can be used to receive a reward from the prize chest.

There are 5 hotspots available to build games:

  • Elemental balance space
  • Game space
  • Prize chest space
  • Ranging game space
  • Stone space

Contents

  • 1 Elemental balance
  • 2 Game
  • 3 Prize chest
  • 4 Ranging game
  • 5 Stone

Elemental balance[edit | edit source]

Players are to use the elemental spells (air, earth, fire and water) to balance the colour of the orb white. Staves can not be used to substitute runes to build any elemental balance.

Level Elemental balance Materials Experience Cost
37 Lesser magical balance Air rune x500
Earth rune x500
Fire rune x500
Water rune x500 		176 10,000
57 Medium balance Air rune x1,000
Earth rune x1,000
Fire rune x1,000
Water rune x1,000 		252 20,000

Earth rune x2,000
Fire rune x2,000
Water rune x2,000 		356 40,000

Game[edit | edit source]

Level Magical Party games Materials Experience Cost
39 Jester Teak plank x4 360 3,672
49 Treasure hunt Teak plank x8
Steel bar x4 		800 9,116
59 Hangman Teak plank x12
Steel bar x6 		1,200 13,674

Prize chest[edit | edit source]

Prize chests have a limit on how much you can deposit for the winner:

  • Oak prize chest = 500
  • Teak prize chest = 1,000
  • Mahogany prize chest = 1,500
Level Chest Materials Experience Cost
34 Oak prize chest Oak plank x4 240 1,884
44 Teak prize chest Teak plank x4
Gold leaf 		660 137,746
54 Mahogany prize chest Mahogany plank x4
Gold leaf 		860 142,726

Ranging game[edit | edit source]

Three different games that test the Ranged skill. The Dartboard and Archery Target require the players to bring their own ranged equipment.

Level Ranging game Materials Experience Cost
30 Hoop and stick Oak plank x2 120 942
54 Dartboard Teak plank x3
Steel bar 		290 3,197
81 Archery target Teak plank x6
Steel bar x3 		600 6,837

Stone[edit | edit source]

Two players have separate combat stones, first one to break the stone is the winner, pieces of this stone may come off and deal damage to the player.

Level Stone Materials Experience Cost
39 Clay attack stone Soft clay x10 100 1,770
59 Limestone attack stone Limestone brick x10 200 1,740
79 Marble attack stone Marble block x4 2,000 1,331,040
